projects.title: RIT Electric Vehicle Team - Embedded Software
projects.description: Firmware for microcontroller systems and software for Linux systems.
projects.text: - Designed the software architecture for co-dependent applications in an embedded Linux environment written in C++ and Python.\nDeveloped low-level device drivers for PIC and ARM microcontrollers in C and C++.\nWrote a build script for parsing industry standard CAN database files to generate datapacking source code in C.
